 2002-08292002-05-230HERITAGE,  PSC,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the LOCALLY-ENGAGED STAFF EMPLOYMENT REGULATIONS by allowing the Department of National Defence to hire civilian employees in any state where Canadian Forces are stationed, by allowing for the hiring of federal public servants who are on leave without pay, and by eliminating now unnecessary references to the Canadian Tourism Commission.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0197 Publication Date: 2002-06-05
